Container.Name: binhex-plex
Container.Category: MediaApp:Video MediaApp:Music MediaApp:Photos MediaServer:Video MediaServer:Music MediaServer:Photos
Container.Overview: The Plex Media Server enriches your life by organizing all your personal media, presenting it beautifully and streaming it to all of your devices. It's easy to use, it's awesome, and it's free!
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Path: /media
Config.Description: This is the container path to your media files, e.g. movies, tv, music, pictures etc.

Config.Name: Path: /shared
Config.Description: This is a special Docker Volume used to store shared information between containers, such as incoming port number.

Config.Name: Variable: TRANS_DIR
Config.Description: Specify the path to store temporary transcode files.

Config.Name: Variable: NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES
Config.Description: Specify whether this container can use all Nvidia driver capabilities for transcoding, if you have a Nvidia card set this to 'all'.

Config.Name: Variable: NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
Config.Description: Specify the Nvidia GPU device id for transcoding, format will be 'GPU-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.

Config.Name: Variable: PLEX_CLAIM
Config.Description: Specify the Plex Claim Code to retrieve your Plex Server, Claim Codes can be generated from https://plex.tv/claim - Note Claim Codes expire after 4 minutes.

Config.Name: Variable: SHARED_NETWORK
Config.Description: Specify whether this container is sharing the network with another VPN container, if set to 'yes' then this container will stop when the VPN container is stopped.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container
